title: Elemental Gloves - Magic Power
description: Elemental Gloves - Magic Power is a casual arcade game where you must beat all your enemies with your powerful gloves. Be the element master that can control various superpowers. You can even turn the bad guys into stone or glass. Shoot with fire, splash with water, or simply hit the enemies. Combine elements in the gloves to create a new superpower. For example, you can try to merge lightning and air to turn the bad guys into balloons.
